hero.title: About Thamizhi
hero.description: Discover our mission to preserve Tamil heritage, promote cultural understanding, and build a stronger Tamil community through education, arts, and community engagement.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To preserve, promote, and celebrate Tamil culture and language through education, community programs, and cultural events that connect generations and strengthen our global Tamil community.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: A thriving global Tamil community where cultural heritage is preserved, language is celebrated, and future generations carry forward the rich traditions of Tamil civilization.

values.title: Cultural Preservation
values.description: Safeguarding Tamil traditions, arts, and customs for future generations

values.title: Educational Excellence
values.description: Providing high-quality Tamil language education and cultural learning opportunities

values.title: Community Unity
values.description: Building strong bonds within the Tamil community through shared experiences and mutual support

values.title: Cultural Innovation
values.description: Adapting traditional practices to modern contexts while maintaining their essence

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in 2010, Thamizhi began as a small group of Tamil families who wanted to create a space where their children could learn about their cultural heritage. Over the years, we have grown into a vibrant community organization serving hundreds of families across the region.

timeline.title: Foundation
timeline.description: Thamizhi was established by 15 founding families

timeline.title: First Cultural Center
timeline.description: Opened our first dedicated space for cultural activities

timeline.title: Language School Launch
timeline.description: Started formal Tamil language education programs

timeline.title: Digital Transformation
timeline.description: Expanded online programs and virtual cultural events

timeline.title: 15th Anniversary
timeline.description: Celebrating 15 years of community service and cultural preservation

leadership.title: Leadership Team
leadership.description: Meet our dedicated board members who guide our mission and vision.

members.name: Dr. Priya Kumaran
members.bio: Community leader with 20+ years of experience in cultural organizations

members.name: Mr. Ravi Selvam
members.bio: Educator and advocate for Tamil language preservation

members.name: Ms. Meera Krishnan
members.bio: Professional organizer specializing in community events

members.name: Mr. Suresh Ramanan
members.bio: Financial expert ensuring transparent resource management

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.description: Celebrating our impact on the Tamil community through years of dedicated service.

awards.title: Outstanding Community Service Award
awards.description: Recognized for exceptional contributions to cultural preservation

awards.title: Best Cultural Education Program
awards.description: Awarded for innovative Tamil language education initiatives

awards.title: Community Impact Recognition
awards.description: Honored for building bridges between communities

partnerships.title: Our Partners
partnerships.description: We collaborate with organizations that share our commitment to cultural preservation and community development.
